ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess un-nerfed? DOUBLE the ef fect?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Welp, I d like to kill the thread I started regarding the supposed insane healing effect of the Lute of the Gypsy Princess. Turns out the guy who blurted it
ygData.messageBody:
Welp, I'd like to kill the thread I started regarding the supposed insane
healing effect of the Lute of the Gypsy Princess. Turns out the guy who
blurted it out over guildsay was full of shiite as I had suspected. =P

The Lute still (sadly) has no special effect for String songs. I personally
think they should make it at least 15% more powerful than a store-bought.
Would be worth the pain in ass it is to acquire, aside from the new quest
being implemented tomorrow.

Can I kill the offshoot of my thread? Jig DOES NOT regen mana!

Everyone - have fun tomorrow with the Lambent scavenger hunting. =)

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
